sentence.Network_en: I was shocked at the audacity and brazenness of the gangsters.

sentence.Network_en: I, for one, admire his audacity.
sentence.Network_cn: 比如说，我就很钦佩他的胆识。

sentence.Network_en: He had the audacity to say I was too fat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他竟敢放肆地说我太肥胖。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from medieval Latin audacitas, from audax, audac- 'bold' (see audacious)

encyclopedia.content: audacity是一款免费的音频处理软件。它是在linux下发展起来的，一款遵循GNU协议的免费软件。有着傻瓜式的操作界面和专业的音频处理效果。

example.ex: I was shocked at the audacity and brazenness of the gangsters.
example.tran: 这伙歹徒如此胆大妄为、厚颜无耻，让我很是震惊。

sentences.sentence: "he had the audacity to question my decision"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such a fine line between audacity and recklessness, though.

auth_sentence.res_content: He fought with unconquerable audacity and fierceness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He fought with unconquerable audacity and fierceness.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"有……倾向;能力或特性等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: cap拿,抓+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→拿住的能力→容量;才能
auda大胆+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.大胆,鲁莽
loqu说话+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.多话,饶舌
mend缺点+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.虚假
rap夺+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.掠夺,贪婪
ten握住+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→tenacious的名词
ver真+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.真实性,诚实

sentences.en: Sky-diving takes both audacity and skill.
sentences.cn: 特技跳伞需要胆量和技巧。

means.word_mean: 鲁莽;胆大妄为,厚颜无耻

sentences.en: He had the audacity to ask for an increase in salary.
sentences.cn: 他竟然厚着脸皮要求增加薪水。
